column4: i have Ubuntu 7.10 i386 desktop edition installed on my PC...  i have a problem with my login window resolution not being correct... i expect that if i set my screen resolution to 1280x960 pixels that the login window would be the same resolution... but this is not the case by me... please tell me how can i override the current (i think it's 640x480) resolution and make it 1280x960 for the login window... please help
